message: Come on, how hard is it to offer a choice of deleting your account?

This has been brought up before:

https://convore.com/feedback/how-do-i-delete-my-convore-account/
This is the Hotel Convore - you join once and stay!
@i The issue I raised back in the old thread is that user profiles seem to be public, so I could see a reason why someone may want to remove it.

Yeah, convore is still awesome as it stands, but if, in the future, I begin to dislike the site I'd love (and I'm sure others would too) having the option of removing their account and all associated data.
We should have the option to close our account
I want to close my account and stop being public it's like mafia
Maybe there should be an "I love the web" checkbox in the signup process. :p
I think deleting all messages or making them all anonymous goes against the spirit of the web.
would you get any value out of closing your account if it didn't delete your messages or make them anonymous?
Yes, so those of us who are continuously creeped out by all of the spying everyone does always can, by inaction, opt in to privacy :P
